   20: -module(ssl_dist_bench_SUITE).
   21: -feature(maybe_expr, enable).
   22: 
   23: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% CT meta
   30: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% Test cases
   36: -export(
   37:    [setup/1,
   38:     parallel_setup/1,
   39:     roundtrip/1,
   40:     sched_utilization/1,
   41:     mean_load_cpu_margin/1,
   42:     throughput_0/1,
   43:     throughput_64/1,
   44:     throughput_1024/1,
   45:     throughput_4096/1,
   46:     throughput_16384/1,
   47:     throughput_65536/1,
   48:     throughput_262144/1,
   49:     throughput_1048576/1]).
   50: 
   51: %% Debug
   52: -export([payload/1, roundtrip_runner/3, setup_runner/3, throughput_runner/4,
   53:         mem/0]).
   54: 
   55: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: 
   57: suite() -> [{ct_hooks, [{ts_install_cth, [{nodenames, 2}]}]}].
   58: 
   59: all() ->
   60:     [{group, smoketest}].
   61: 
   62: groups() ->
   63:     [{smoketest, protocols()},
   64:      {benchmark, protocols()},
   65:      %%
   66:      %% protocols()
   67:      {ssl,         ssl_backends()},
   68:      {cryptcookie, cryptcookie_backends()},
   69:      {plain,       categories()},
   70:      {socket,      categories()},
   71:      %%
   72:      %% ssl_backends()
   73:      {tls,  categories()},
   74:      {ktls, categories()},
   75:      %%
   76:      %% cryptcookie_backends()
   77:      {dist_cryptcookie_socket, categories()},
   78:      {cryptcookie_socket_ktls, categories()},
   79:      {dist_cryptcookie_inet,   categories()},
   80:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls,   categories()},
   81:      %%
   82:      %% categories()
   83:      {setup, [{repeat, 1}],
   84:       [setup,
   85:        parallel_setup]},
   86:      {roundtrip, [{repeat, 1}], [roundtrip]},
   87:      {sched_utilization,[{repeat, 1}],
   88:       [sched_utilization,
   89:        mean_load_cpu_margin]},
   90:      {throughput, [{repeat, 1}],
   91:       [throughput_0,
   92:        throughput_64,
   93:        throughput_1024,
   94:        throughput_4096,
   95:        throughput_16384,
   96:        throughput_65536,
   97:        throughput_262144,
   98:        throughput_1048576]}].
   99: 
  100: protocols() ->
  101:     [{group, ssl},
  102:      {group, cryptcookie},
  103:      {group, plain},
  104:      {group, socket}].
  105: 
  106: ssl_backends() ->
  107:     [{group, tls},
  108:      {group, ktls}].
  109: 
  110: cryptcookie_backends() ->
  111:     [{group, dist_cryptcookie_socket},
  112:      {group, cryptcookie_socket_ktls},
  113:      {group, dist_cryptcookie_inet},
  114:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls}].
  115: 
  116: categories() ->
  117:     [{group, setup},
  118:      {group, roundtrip},
  119:      {group, throughput},
  120:      {group, sched_utilization}
  121:     ].
  122: 
  123: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  124:     Digest = sha256,
  125:     ECCurve = secp521r1,
  126: %%%     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.2',
  127: %%%     TLSCipher =
  128: %%%         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  129: %%%           cipher       => aes_128_cbc,
  130: %%%           mac          => sha256,
  131: %%%           prf          => sha256},
  132:     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.3',
  133:     TLSCipher =
  134:         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  135:           cipher       => aes_256_gcm,
  136:           mac          => aead,
  137:           prf          => sha384},
  138:     %%
  139:     Node = node(),
  140:     Skip = make_ref(),
  141:     try
  142:         Node =/= nonode@nohost orelse
  143:             throw({Skip,"Node not distributed"}),
  144:         verify_node_src_addr(),
  145:         {supported, SSLVersions} =
  146:             lists:keyfind(supported, 1, ssl:versions()),
  147:         lists:member(TLSVersion, SSLVersions) orelse
  148:             throw(
  149:               {Skip,
  150:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSVersion)}),
  151: %%%         lists:member(ECCurve, ssl:eccs(TLSVersion)) orelse
  152: %%%             throw(
  153: %%%               {Skip,
  154: %%%                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(ECCurve)}),
  155:         TLSCipherKeys = maps:keys(TLSCipher),
  156:         lists:any(
  157:           fun (Cipher) ->
  158:                   maps:with(TLSCipherKeys, Cipher) =:= TLSCipher
  159:           end,
  160:           ssl:cipher_suites(default, TLSVersion)) orelse
  161:             throw(
  162:               {Skip,
  163:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSCipher)}),
  164:         %%
  165:         %%
  166:         %%
  167:         CertOptions =
  168:             [{digest, Digest},
  169:              {key, {namedCurve, ECCurve}}],
  170:         RootCert =
  171:             public_key:pkix_test_root_cert(
  172:               ?MODULE_STRING ++ " ROOT CA", CertOptions),
  173:         SSLConf =
  174:             [{verify, verify_peer},
  175:              {versions, [TLSVersion]},
  176:              {ciphers, [TLSCipher]}],
  177:         ServerConf =
  178:             [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  179:              {verify_fun,
  180:               {fun inet_tls_dist:verify_client/3,[]}}
  181:             | SSLConf],
  182:         ClientConf = SSLConf,
  183:         %%
  184:         PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  185:         %%
  186:         ServerNode = ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(dist_server),
  187:         [_, ServerHost] = split_node(ServerNode),
  188:         ServerName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_server",
  189:         ServerString = ServerName ++ "@" ++ ServerHost,
  190:         ServerConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ServerString ++ ".conf"),
  191:         Server = list_to_atom(ServerString),
  192:         %%
  193:         write_node_conf(
  194:           ServerConfFile, Server, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  195:           CertOptions, RootCert),
  196:         %%
  197:         Schedulers =
  198:             erpc:call(ServerNode, erlang, system_info, [schedulers]),
  199:         [_, ClientHost] = split_node(Node),
  200:         [{server_node, ServerNode},
  201:          {server_name, ServerName},
  202:          {server, Server},
  203:          {server_dist_args,
  204:           "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  205:           "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ServerConfFile ++ " "},
  206:          {clients, Schedulers} |
  207:          init_client_node(
  208:            ClientHost, Schedulers, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  209:            CertOptions, RootCert, Config)]
  210:     catch
  211:         throw : {Skip, Reason} ->
  212:             {skip, Reason};
  213:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  214:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  215:     end.
  216: 
  217: init_client_node(
  218:   _ClientHost, 0, _PrivDir, _ServerConf, _ClientConf,
  219:   _CertOptions, _RootCert, Config) ->
  220:     Config;
  221: init_client_node(
  222:   ClientHost, N, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  223:   CertOptions, RootCert, Config) ->
  224:     ClientName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_client_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  225:     ClientString = ClientName ++ "@" ++ ClientHost,
  226:     ClientConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ClientString ++ ".conf"),
  227:     Client = list_to_atom(ClientString),
  228:     %%
  229:     write_node_conf(
  230:       ClientConfFile, Client, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  231:       CertOptions, RootCert),
  232:     init_client_node(
  233:       ClientHost, N - 1, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  234:       CertOptions, RootCert,
  235:       [{{client_name, N}, ClientName},
  236:        {{client, N}, Client},
  237:        {{client_dist_args, N},
  238:         "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  239:         "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ClientConfFile ++ " "} | Config]).
  240: 
  241: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  242:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  243:     ssl_bench_test_lib:cleanup(ServerNode).
  244: 
  245: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  246:     [{effort,10}|Config];
  247: %%
  248: init_per_group(ssl, Config) ->
  249:     [{ssl_dist, true}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "SSL"}|Config];
  250: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_socket, Config) ->
  251:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_socket:supported() of
  252:         ok ->
  253:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket"},
  254:              {ssl_dist_args,
  255:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_socket"}
  256:             | Config];
  257:         Problem ->
  258:             {skip, Problem}
  259:     catch
  260:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  261:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  262:     end;
  263: init_per_group(cryptcookie_socket_ktls, Config) ->
  264:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_socket_ktls:supported() of
  265:         ok ->
  266:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket-kTLS"},
  267:              {ssl_dist_args,
  268:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_socket_ktls"}
  269:             | Config];
  270:         Problem ->
  271:             {skip, Problem}
  272:     catch
  273:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  274:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  275:     end;
  276: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_inet, Config) ->
  277:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_inet:supported() of
  278:         ok ->
  279:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet"},
  280:              {ssl_dist_args,
  281:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_inet"}
  282:             | Config];
  283:         Problem ->
  284:             {skip, Problem}
  285:     catch
  286:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  287:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  288:     end;
  289: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls, Config) ->
  290:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  291:         ok ->
  292:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS"},
  293:              {ssl_dist_args,
  294:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls"}
  295:             | Config];
  296:         Problem ->
  297:             {skip, Problem}
  298:     catch
  299:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  300:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  301:     end;
  302: init_per_group(plain, Config) ->
  303:     [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Plain"}|Config];
  304: %%
  305: init_per_group(socket, Config) ->
  306:     try inet_epmd_socket:supported() of
  307:         ok ->
  308:             [{ssl_dist, false},
  309:              {ssl_dist_prefix, "Socket"},
  310:              {ssl_dist_args,
  311:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd socket"}
  312:             | Config];
  313:         Problem ->
  314:             {skip, Problem}
  315:     catch
  316:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  317:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  318:     end;
  319: %%
  320: init_per_group(ktls, Config) ->
  321:     case ktls_supported() of
  322:         ok ->
  323:             [{ktls, true},
  324:              {ssl_dist_prefix,
  325:               proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config) ++ "-kTLS"}
  326:             | proplists:delete(ssl_dist_prefix, Config)];
  327:         {error, Reason} ->
  328:             {skip, Reason}
  329:     end;
  330: %%
  331: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  332:     Config.
  333: 
  334: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
  338:     case proplists:is_defined(effort, Conf) of
  339:         false ->
  340:             %% Not a benchmark run
  341:             case atom_to_list(Func) of
  342:                 "throughput_64" ->
  343:                     Conf;
  344:                 "throughput_"++_ ->
  345:                     {skipped, "Benchmarks run separately"};
  346:                 _ ->
  347:                     Conf
  348:             end;
  349:         true ->
  350:             Conf
  351:     end.
  352: 
  353: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Conf) ->
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: 
  357: ktls_supported() ->
  358:     {ok, Listen} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}]),
  359:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
  360:     {ok, Client} =
  361:         gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port, [{active, false}]),
  362:     try
  363:         maybe
  364:             {ok, OS} ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_os(),
  365:             ok ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_ulp(Client, OS),
  366:             ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_cipher(Client, OS, tx, 1)
  367:         end
  368:     after
  369:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  370:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Listen)
  371:     end.
  372: 
  373: 
  374: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  375: %%% CommonTest API helpers
  376: 
  377: verify_node_src_addr() ->
  378:     Msg = "Hello, world!",
  379:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  380:     {ok,DstAddr} = inet:getaddr(Host, inet),
  381:     {ok,Socket} = gen_udp:open(0, [{active,false}]),
  382:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  383:     ok = gen_udp:send(Socket, DstAddr, Port, Msg),
  384:     %% Ubuntu has got 127.0.1.1 in /etc/hosts, but that IP address is
  385:     %% not assigned to the interface.
  386:     %% `ip addr add 127.0.1.1 dev lo` as root solves that problem
  387:     case gen_udp:recv(Socket, length(Msg) + 1, 1000) of
  388:         {ok,{DstAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  389:             ok;
  390:         {ok,{SrcAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  391:             throw({skipped,
  392:                    "Src and dst address mismatch: " ++
  393:                        term_to_string(SrcAddr) ++ " =:= " ++
  394:                        term_to_string(DstAddr)});
  395:         Weird ->
  396:             error(Weird)
  397:     end.
  398: 
  399: write_node_conf(
  400:   ConfFile, Node, ServerConf, ClientConf, CertOptions, RootCert) ->
  401:     [Name,Host] = split_node(Node),
  402:     Conf =
  403:         public_key:pkix_test_data(
  404:           #{root => RootCert,
  405:             peer =>
  406:                 [{extensions,
  407:                   [
  408:                    #'Extension'{
  409:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  410:                       extnValue = [{dNSName, Host}],
  411:                       critical = true},
  412:                    #'Extension'{
  413:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  414:                       extnValue =
  415:                           [{directoryName,
  416:                             {rdnSequence,
  417:                              [[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{
  418:                                   type = ?'id-at-commonName',
  419:                                   value =
  420:                                       {utf8String,
  421:                                        unicode:characters_to_binary(
  422:                                          Name, utf8)
  423:                                       }
  424:                                  }]]}}],
  425:                       critical = true}
  426:                   ]} | CertOptions]}),
  427:     NodeConf =
  428:         [{server, ServerConf ++ Conf}, {client, ClientConf ++ Conf}],
  429:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
  430:     ok = file:change_mode(ConfFile, 8#400),
  431:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [NodeConf]),
  432:     ok = file:close(Fd).
  433: 
  434: split_node(Node) ->
  435:     string:split(atom_to_list(Node), "@").
  436: 
  437: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  438: %%% Test cases
  439: 
  440: %%-----------------------
  441: %% Connection setup speed
  442: 
  443: setup(Config) ->
  444:     run_nodepair_test(fun setup/6, Config).
  445: 
  446: setup(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  447:     Rounds = 100 * Effort,
  448:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  449:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  450:     pong = ssl_apply(HA, net_adm, ping, [B]),
  451:     _ = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  452:     {Log, Before, After} =
  453:         ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  454:     ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  455:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  456:     ChildCountResult =
  457:         ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(
  458:           HA, supervisor, count_children, [tls_dist_connection_sup]),
  459:     ?CT_LOG("TLS Connection Child Count Result: ~p", [ChildCountResult]),
  460:     {SetupTime, CycleTime} =
  461:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  462:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> setup_wait_nodedown(A, 10000) end),
  463:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  464:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  465:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  466:     SetupSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / SetupTime),
  467:     CycleSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / CycleTime),
  468:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  469:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  470:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  471:     report(Prefix++" Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s " ++ MemSuffix).
  472: 
  473: %% Runs on node A against rex in node B
  474: setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  475:     StartTime = start_time(),
  476:     SetupTime = setup_loop(A, B, 0, Rounds),
  477:     {microseconds(SetupTime), microseconds(elapsed_time(StartTime))}.
  478: 
  479: setup_loop(_A, _B, T, 0) ->
  480:     T;
  481: setup_loop(A, B, T, N) ->
  482:     StartTime = start_time(),
  483:     try erpc:call(B, net_adm, ping, [A]) of
  484:         pong -> ok;
  485:         Other ->
  486:             error({N,Other})
  487:     catch
  488:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  489:             erlang:raise(Class, {N,Reason}, Stacktrace)
  490:     end,
  491:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  492:     [N,B] = [N|erlang:nodes()],
  493:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, {rex,B}),
  494:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(B),
  495:     receive
  496:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_,_} ->
  497:             [] = erlang:nodes(),
  498:             setup_loop(A, B, Time + T, N - 1)
  499:     end.
  500: 
  501: setup_wait_nodedown(A, Time) ->
  502:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  503:     case nodes() of
  504:         [] ->
  505:             ok;
  506:         [A] ->
  507:             receive
  508:                 {nodedown,A} ->
  509:                     ok;
  510:                 Unexpected ->
  511:                     {error,{unexpected,Unexpected}}
  512:             after Time ->
  513:                     {error,timeout}
  514:             end
  515:     end.
  516: 
  517: 
  518: set_cpu_affinity(client) ->
  519:     set_cpu_affinity(1);
  520: set_cpu_affinity(server) ->
  521:     set_cpu_affinity(2);
  522: set_cpu_affinity(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
  523:     case erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) of
  524:         undefined ->
  525:             {"", undefined, undefined};
  526:         CpuTopology ->
  527:             Log = taskset(element(Index, split_cpus(CpuTopology))),
  528:             %% Update Schedulers
  529:             _ = erlang:system_info(update_cpu_info),
  530:             Schedulers = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  531:             {Log,
  532:              erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, Schedulers),
  533:              Schedulers}
  534:     end.
  535: 
  536: taskset(LogicalProcessors) ->
  537:     os:cmd(
  538:       "taskset -c -p " ++
  539:           lists:flatten(
  540:             lists:join(
  541:               ",",
  542:               [integer_to_list(Id) || Id <- LogicalProcessors]),
  543:             " ") ++ os:getpid()).
  544: 
  545: split_cpus([{_Tag, List}]) ->
  546:     split_cpus(List);
  547: split_cpus(List = [_ | _]) ->
  548:     {A, B} = lists:split(length(List) bsr 1, List),
  549:     {logical_processors(A), logical_processors(B)}.
  550: 
  551: logical_processors([{_Tag, {logical, Id}} | Items]) ->
  552:     [Id | logical_processors(Items)];
  553: logical_processors([{_Tag, List} | Items]) ->
  554:     logical_processors(List) ++ logical_processors(Items);
  555: logical_processors([]) ->
  556:     [].
  557: 
  558: 
  559: %%----------------
  560: %% Parallel setup
  561: 
  562: parallel_setup(Config) ->
  563:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  564:     parallel_setup(Config, Clients, Clients, []).
  565: 
  566: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I, HNs) when 0 < I ->
  567:     Key = {client, I},
  568:     Node = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  569:     Handle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config),
  570:     _ = ssl_apply(Handle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  571:     try
  572:         parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I - 1, [{Handle, Node} | HNs])
  573:     after
  574:         stop_ssl_node(Key, Handle, Config)
  575:     end;
  576: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, _0, HNs) ->
  577:     Key = server,
  578:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  579:     ServerHandle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config, 0),
  580:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
  581:     TotalRounds = 1000 * Effort,
  582:     Rounds = round(TotalRounds / Clients),
  583:     try
  584:         {Log, Before, After} =
  585:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  586:         ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  587:         ServerMemBefore =
  588:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  589:         parallel_setup_result(
  590:           Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore,
  591:           [parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds)
  592:            || {Handle, Node} <- HNs])
  593:     after
  594:         stop_ssl_node(Key, ServerHandle, Config)
  595:     end.
  596: 
  597: parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds) ->
  598:     Collector = self(),
  599:     Tag = make_ref(),
  600:     _ =
  601:         spawn_link(
  602:           fun () ->
  603:                   Collector !
  604:                       {Tag,
  605:                        try
  606:                            MemBefore =
  607:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  608:                            Result =
  609:                                ssl_apply(
  610:                                  Handle, ?MODULE, setup_runner,
  611:                                  [Node, ServerNode, Rounds]),
  612:                            MemAfter =
  613:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  614:                            {MemBefore, Result, MemAfter}
  615:                        catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  616:                                {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}
  617:                        end}
  618:           end),
  619:     Tag.
  620: 
  621: parallel_setup_result(
  622:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags) ->
  623:     parallel_setup_result(
  624:       Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  625:       0, 0, 0).
  626: %%
  627: parallel_setup_result(
  628:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [Tag | Tags],
  629:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  630:     receive
  631:         {Tag, {Mem1, {ST, CT}, Mem2}}
  632:           when is_integer(ST), is_integer(CT) ->
  633:             parallel_setup_result(
  634:               Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  635:               SetupTime + ST, CycleTime + CT, Mem + Mem2 - Mem1);
  636:         {Tag, Error} ->
  637:             exit(Error)
  638:     end;
  639: parallel_setup_result(
  640:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [],
  641:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  642:     ServerMemAfter =
  643:         ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  644:     ServerMem = ServerMemAfter - ServerMemBefore,
  645:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  646:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  647:     SetupSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (SetupTime/1000000)),
  648:     CycleSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (CycleTime/1000000)),
  649:     {MemC, MemS, MemSuffix} = mem_result({Mem / Clients, ServerMem}),
  650:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Clients", MemC, "KByte"),
  651:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Server", MemS, "KByte"),
  652:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  653:     report(
  654:       Prefix++" Parallel Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s "
  655:       ++ MemSuffix).
  656: 
  657: %%----------------
  658: %% Roundtrip speed
  659: 
  660: roundtrip(Config) ->
  661:     run_nodepair_test(fun roundtrip/6, Config).
  662: 
  663: roundtrip(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  664:     Rounds = 4000 * Effort,
  665:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  666:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  667:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  668:     ok = ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, allow, [[B]]),
  669:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, allow, [[A]]),
  670:     Time = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  671:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  672:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  673:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  674:     Speed = round((Rounds*1000000) / Time),
  675:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  676:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  677:     report(Prefix++" Roundtrip", Speed, "pings/s " ++ MemSuffix).
  678: 
  679: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  680: roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  681:     ClientPid = self(),
  682:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  683:     ServerPid =
  684:         erlang:spawn(
  685:           B,
  686:           fun () ->
  687:                   roundtrip_server(ClientPid, Rounds)
  688:           end),
  689:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
  690:     roundtrip_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, start_time(), Rounds).
  691: 
  692: roundtrip_server(_Pid, 0) ->
  693:     exit(ok);
  694: roundtrip_server(Pid, N) ->
  695:     receive
  696:         N ->
  697:             Pid ! N,
  698:             roundtrip_server(Pid, N-1)
  699:     end.
  700: 
  701: roundtrip_client(_Pid, Mon, StartTime, 0) ->
  702:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  703:     receive
  704:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, ok} ->
  705:             Time;
  706:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
  707:             exit(Other)
  708:     end;
  709: roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N) ->
  710:     Pid ! N,
  711:     receive
  712:         N ->
  713:             roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N - 1)
  714:     end.
  715: 
  716: %%---------------------------------------
  717: %% Scheduler utilization at constant load
  718: 
  719: 
  720: sched_utilization(Config) ->
  721:     run_nodepair_test(
  722:       fun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  723:               sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config)
  724:       end, Config).
  725: 
  726: sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config) ->
  727:     SSL = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config),
  728:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  729:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  730:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  731:     PidA = ssl_apply(HA, os, getpid, []),
  732:     PidB = ssl_apply(HB, os, getpid, []),
  733:     ?CT_PAL("Starting scheduler utilization run effort ~w:~n"
  734:            "    [~s] ~w~n"
  735:            "    [~s] ~w~n",
  736:            [Effort, PidA, A, PidB, B]),
  737:     {ClientMsacc, ServerMsacc, BusyDistPortMsgs} =
  738:         ssl_apply(
  739:           HA,
  740:           fun () ->
  741:                   Result = sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, SSL, Config),
  742:                   fs_log(
  743:                     Config,
  744:                     "sched_utilization.Result", Result),
  745:                   Result
  746:           end),
  747:     ?CT_LOG("Got ~p busy_dist_port msgs",[tail(BusyDistPortMsgs)]),
  748:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  749:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  750:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  751:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [A]),
  752:     msacc:print(ClientMsacc),
  753:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [B]),
  754:     msacc:print(ServerMsacc),
  755:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of B from A: ~p",
  756:            [ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, node_info, [B])]),
  757:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of A from B: ~p",
  758:            [ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, node_info, [A])]),
  759:     SchedUtilClient =
  760:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ClientMsacc) /
  761:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ClientMsacc)),
  762:     SchedUtilServer =
  763:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ServerMsacc) /
  764:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ServerMsacc)),
  765:     Verdict =
  766:         if
  767:             BusyDistPortMsgs =:= 0 ->
  768:                 "";
  769:             is_integer(BusyDistPortMsgs) ->
  770:                 " ?";
  771:             true ->
  772:                 ?CT_LOG("Stray Msgs: ~p", [BusyDistPortMsgs]),
  773:                 " ???"
  774:         end,
  775:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Client Mem", MemA, "KByte"),
  776:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server Mem", MemB, "KByte"),
  777:     {comment, ClientComment} =
  778:         report(Prefix ++ " Sched Utilization Client" ++ Verdict,
  779:                SchedUtilClient, " %" ++ Verdict),
  780:     {comment, ServerComment} =
  781:         report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server" ++ Verdict,
  782:                SchedUtilServer, " %" ++ Verdict),
  783:     {comment,
  784:      "Client " ++ ClientComment ++ ", Server " ++ ServerComment ++
  785:          " " ++ MemSuffix}.
  786: 
  787: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  788: %% We want to avoid getting busy_dist_port as it hides the true SU usage
  789: %% of the receiver and sender.
  790: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, true, Config) ->
  791:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  792: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, false, Config) ->
  793:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  794: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, Senders, Config) ->
  795:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  796:     Payload = payload(100),
  797:     Time = 1000 * Effort,
  798:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  799:     ServerPids =
  800:         [erlang:spawn_link(
  801:            B, fun () -> throughput_server() end)
  802:          || _ <- lists:seq(1, Senders)],
  803:     Tag = make_ref(),
  804:     ServerMsacc =
  805:         erlang:spawn_link(
  806:           B,
  807:           fun() ->
  808:                   receive
  809:                       {start,Tag,Pid} ->
  810:                           fs_log(
  811:                             Config,
  812:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc.self",
  813:                             self()),
  814:                           msacc:start(Time),
  815:                           fs_log(
  816:                             Config,
  817:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:start",
  818:                             ok),
  819:                           receive
  820:                               {done,Tag,Pid} ->
  821:                                   fs_log(
  822:                                     Config,
  823:                                     "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  824:                                     ok),
  825:                                   ServerStats = msacc:stats(),
  826:                                   fs_log(Config,
  827:                                          "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  828:                                          ServerStats),
  829:                                   exit({result,Tag,ServerStats})
  830:                           end
  831:                   end
  832:           end),
  833:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[busy_dist_port]),
  834:     %% We spawn 100 senders that send a message every 10 ms
  835:     %% which should produce a load of 10000 msgs/s with
  836:     %% payload 100 bytes each -> 1 MByte/s
  837:     _Clients =
  838:         [spawn_link(
  839:            fun() ->
  840:                    throughput_client(Pid, Payload)
  841:            end) || Pid <- ServerPids],
  842:     %%
  843:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  844:     ServerMsacc ! {start,Tag,self()},
  845:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.self", self()),
  846:     msacc:start(Time),
  847:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc:start", ok),
  848:     ClientMsaccStats = msacc:stats(),
  849:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc.stats", ClientMsaccStats),
  850:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  851:     ServerMsacc ! {done,Tag,self()},
  852:     ServerMsaccStats =
  853:         receive
  854:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,{result,Tag,Stats}} ->
  855:                 Stats;
  856:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,Other} ->
  857:                 exit({other,ServerMsacc,Other})
  858:         end,
  859:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.ServerMsaccStats", ServerMsaccStats),
  860:     %%
  861:     {ClientMsaccStats,ServerMsaccStats, busy_dist_port_msgs()}.
  862: 
  863: fs_log(Config, Name, Term) ->
  864:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  865:     DistPrefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  866:     _ = file:write_file(
  867:           filename:join(PrivDir, DistPrefix ++ "_" ++ Name),
  868:           io_lib:format(
  869:             "~p~n",
  870:             [{{erlang:unique_integer([positive,monotonic]),
  871:                os:system_time(1000000)},
  872:              Term}])),
  873:     ok.
  874: 
  875: busy_dist_port_msgs() ->
  876:     busy_dist_port_msgs(0).
  877: %%
  878: busy_dist_port_msgs(N) ->
  879:     receive
  880:         M ->
  881:             case M of
  882:                 {monitor, P1, busy_dist_port, P2}
  883:                   when is_pid(P1), is_pid(P2) ->
  884:                     busy_dist_port_msgs(N + 1);
  885:                 Stray ->
  886:                     [Stray | busy_dist_port_msgs(N)]
  887:             end
  888:     after 0 ->
  889:             N
  890:     end.
  891: 
  892: tail([_|Tail]) ->
  893:     tail(Tail);
  894: tail(Tail) ->
  895:     Tail.
  896: 
  897: throughput_server() ->
  898:     receive _ -> ok end,
  899:     receive _ -> ok end,
  900:     receive _ -> ok end,
  901:     receive _ -> ok end,
  902:     receive _ -> ok end,
  903:     receive _ -> ok end,
  904:     receive _ -> ok end,
  905:     receive _ -> ok end,
  906:     receive _ -> ok end,
  907:     receive _ -> ok end,
  908:     throughput_server().
  909: 
  910: throughput_client(Pid, Payload) ->
  911:     Pid ! Payload,
  912:     receive after 10 -> throughput_client(Pid, Payload) end.
  913: 
  914: %%-----------------
  915: %% Mean load CPU margin
  916: %%
  917: %% Start pairs of processes with the client on node A
  918: %% and the server on node B.  The clients sends requests
  919: %% with random interval and payload and the servers reply
  920: %% immediately.
  921: %%
  922: %% Also, besides each server there is a compute process
  923: %% that does CPU work with low process priority and we measure
  924: %% how much such work that gets done.
  925: 
  926: mean_load_cpu_margin(Config) ->
  927:     run_nodepair_test(fun run_mlcm/6, Config).
  928: 
  929: -define(MLCM_NO, 100).
  930: 
  931: run_mlcm(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  932:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  933:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  934:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  935:     pong = ssl_apply(HB, net_adm, ping, [A]),
  936:     Count = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> mlcm(B, Effort) end),
  937:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  938:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  939:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  940:     report(
  941:       Prefix++" CPU Margin",
  942:       round(Count/?MLCM_NO/Effort),
  943:       "stones " ++ MemSuffix).
  944: 
  945: mlcm(Node, Effort) ->
  946:     Payloads = mlcm_payloads(),
  947:     Clients =
  948:         [mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) || _ <- lists:seq(1, ?MLCM_NO)],
  949:     receive after 1000 * Effort -> ok end,
  950:     [Alias ! {Alias,stop} || {_Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  951:     Counts =
  952:         [receive
  953:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,{Alias, Count}} ->
  954:                  Count;
  955:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
  956:                  exit(Reason)
  957:          end || {Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  958:     lists:sum(Counts).
  959: 
  960: mlcm_payloads() ->
  961:     Bin = list_to_binary([rand:uniform(256) - 1 || _ <- lists:seq(1, 512)]),
  962:     lists:foldl(
  963:       fun (N, Payloads) ->
  964:               Payloads#{N => binary:copy(Bin, N)}
  965:       end, #{}, lists:seq(0, 255)).
  966: 
  967: %%-------
  968: 
  969: mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) ->
  970:     Parent = self(),
  971:     StartRef = make_ref(),
  972:     {_,Monitor} =
  973:         spawn_monitor(
  974:           fun () ->
  975:                   Alias = alias(),
  976:                   Parent ! {StartRef, Alias},
  977:                   Server = mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias),
  978:                   mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, 0)
  979:           end),
  980:     receive
  981:         {StartRef, Alias} ->
  982:             {Monitor, Alias};
  983:         {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
  984:             exit(Reason)
  985:     end.
  986: 
  987: mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq) ->
  988:     {Time, Index} = mlcm_rand(),
  989:     Payload = maps:get(Index, Payloads),
  990:     receive after Time -> ok end,
  991:     Server ! {Alias, Seq, Payload},
  992:     receive
  993:         {Alias, Seq, Pl} when byte_size(Pl) =:= byte_size(Payload) ->
  994:             mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq + 1);
  995:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
  996:             Server ! Msg,
  997:             receive after infinity -> ok end
  998:     end.
  999: 
 1000: %% Approximate normal distribution Index with an average of 6 uniform bytes
 1001: %% and use the 7:th byte for uniform Time
 1002: mlcm_rand() ->
 1003:     mlcm_rand(6, rand:uniform(1 bsl (1+6)*8) - 1, 0).
 1004: %%
 1005: mlcm_rand(0, X, I) ->
 1006:     Time = X + 1, % 1..256
 1007:     Index = abs((I - 3*256) div 3), % 0..255 upper half or normal distribution
 1008:     {Time, Index};
 1009: mlcm_rand(N, X, I) ->
 1010:     mlcm_rand(N - 1, X bsr 8, I + (X band 255)).
 1011: 
 1012: %%-------
 1013: 
 1014: mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias) ->
 1015:     spawn_link(
 1016:       Node,
 1017:       fun () ->
 1018:               Compute = mlcm_compute_start(Alias),
 1019:               mlcm_server(Alias, 0, Compute)
 1020:       end).
 1021: 
 1022: mlcm_server(Alias, Seq, Compute) ->
 1023:     receive
 1024:         {Alias, Seq, _Payload} = Msg ->
 1025:             Alias ! Msg,
 1026:       mlcm_server(Alias, Seq + 1, Compute);
 1027:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
 1028:             Compute ! Msg,
 1029:             receive after infinity -> om end
 1030:     end.
 1031: 
 1032: %%-------
 1033: 
 1034: mlcm_compute_start(Alias) ->
 1035:     spawn_opt(
 1036:       fun () ->
 1037:               rand:seed(exro928ss),
 1038:               mlcm_compute(Alias, 0, 0)
 1039:       end,
 1040:       [link, {priority,low}]).
 1041: 
 1042: mlcm_compute(Alias, State, Count) ->
 1043:     receive {Alias, stop} -> exit({Alias, Count})
 1044:     after 0 -> ok
 1045:     end,
 1046:     mlcm_compute(
 1047:       Alias,
 1048:       %% CPU payload
 1049:       (State +
 1050:            lists:sum([rand:uniform(1 bsl 48) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 999)]))
 1051:           div 1000,
 1052:       Count + 1).
 1053: 
 1054: %%-----------------
 1055: %% Throughput speed
 1056: 
 1057: throughput_0(Config) ->
 1058:     run_nodepair_test(
 1059:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1060:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 0)
 1061:       end, Config).
 1062: 
 1063: throughput_64(Config) ->
 1064:     run_nodepair_test(
 1065:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1066:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 64)
 1067:       end, Config).
 1068: 
 1069: throughput_1024(Config) ->
 1070:     run_nodepair_test(
 1071:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1072:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 10000 * Effort, 1024)
 1073:       end, Config).
 1074: 
 1075: throughput_4096(Config) ->
 1076:     run_nodepair_test(
 1077:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1078:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 5000 * Effort, 4096)
 1079:       end, Config).
 1080: 
 1081: throughput_16384(Config) ->
 1082:     run_nodepair_test(
 1083:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1084:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 1000 * Effort, 16384)
 1085:       end, Config).
 1086: 
 1087: throughput_65536(Config) ->
 1088:     run_nodepair_test(
 1089:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1090:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 200 * Effort, 65536)
 1091:       end, Config).
 1092: 
 1093: throughput_262144(Config) ->
 1094:     run_nodepair_test(
 1095:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1096:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50 * Effort, 262144)
 1097:       end, Config).
 1098: 
 1099: throughput_1048576(Config) ->
 1100:     run_nodepair_test(
 1101:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1102:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 20 * Effort, 1048576)
 1103:       end, Config).
 1104: 
 1105: throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, Packets, Size) ->
 1106:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1107:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1108:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
 1109:     #{time := Time,
 1110:       client_msacc_stats := ClientMsaccStats,
 1111:       client_prof := ClientProf,
 1112:       server_msacc_stats := ServerMsaccStats,
 1113:       server_prof := ServerProf,
 1114:       server_gc_before := Server_GC_Before,
 1115:       server_gc_after := Server_GC_After} =
 1116:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> throughput_runner(A, B, Packets, Size) end),
 1117:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1118:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1119:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
 1120:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1121:         msacc:print(ClientMsaccStats),
 1122:     Overhead =
 1123:         50 % Distribution protocol headers (empirical) (TLS+=54)
 1124:         + byte_size(erlang:term_to_binary([0|<<>>])), % Benchmark overhead
 1125:     Bytes = Packets * (Size + Overhead),
 1126:     io:format("~w bytes, ~.4g s~n", [Bytes,Time/1000000]),
 1127:     SizeString = integer_to_list(Size),
 1128:     _ = report(
 1129:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
 1130:     _ = report(
 1131:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
 1132:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1133:         report(
 1134:           Prefix ++ " Sender_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1135:           round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ClientMsaccStats)
 1136:                 * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1137:           "ps/byte"),
 1138:     ServerMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1139:         begin
 1140:             report(
 1141:               Prefix ++ " Receiver_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1142:               round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ServerMsaccStats)
 1143:                     * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1144:               "ps/byte"),
 1145:             msacc:print(ServerMsaccStats)
 1146:         end,
 1147:     io:format("******* ClientProf:~n", []), prof_print(ClientProf),
 1148:     io:format("******* ServerProf:~n", []), prof_print(ServerProf),
 1149:     io:format("******* Server GC Before:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_Before]),
 1150:     io:format("******* Server GC After:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_After]),
 1151:     Speed = round((Bytes * 1000000) / (1024 * Time)),
 1152:     report(
 1153:       Prefix ++ " Throughput_" ++ SizeString, Speed, "kB/s " ++ MemSuffix).
 1154: 
 1155: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
 1156: throughput_runner(A, B, Rounds, Size) ->
 1157:     Payload = payload(Size),
 1158:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
 1159:     ClientPid = self(),
 1160:     ServerPid =
 1161:         erlang:spawn_opt(
 1162:           B,
 1163:           fun () -> throughput_server(ClientPid, Rounds) end,
 1164:           [{message_queue_data, off_heap}]),
 1165:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
 1166:     msacc_available() andalso
 1167:         begin
 1168:             msacc:stop(),
 1169:             msacc:reset(),
 1170:             msacc:start(),
 1171:             ok
 1172:         end,
 1173:     prof_start(),
 1174:     #{time := Time} = Result =
 1175:         throughput_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, Payload, Rounds),
 1176:     prof_stop(),
 1177:     MsaccStats =
 1178:         case msacc_available() of
 1179:             true ->
 1180:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1181:                 msacc:stop(),
 1182:                 MStats;
 1183:             false ->
 1184:                 undefined
 1185:         end,
 1186:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1187:     Result#{time := microseconds(Time),
 1188:             client_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1189:             client_prof => Prof}.
 1190: 
 1191: throughput_server(Pid, N) ->
 1192:     GC_Before = get_server_gc_info(),
 1193:     %% dbg:tracer(port, dbg:trace_port(file, "throughput_server_gc.log")),
 1194:     %% dbg:p(TLSDistReceiver, garbage_collection),
 1195:     msacc_available() andalso
 1196:         begin
 1197:             msacc:stop(),
 1198:             msacc:reset(),
 1199:             msacc:start(),
 1200:             ok
 1201:         end,
 1202:     prof_start(),
 1203:     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N).
 1204: 
 1205: throughput_server_loop(_Pid, GC_Before, 0) ->
 1206:     prof_stop(),
 1207:     MsaccStats =
 1208:         case msacc_available() of
 1209:             true ->
 1210:                 msacc:stop(),
 1211:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1212:                 msacc:reset(),
 1213:                 MStats;
 1214:             false ->
 1215:                 undefined
 1216:         end,
 1217:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1218:     %% dbg:flush_trace_port(),
 1219:     exit(#{server_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1220:            server_prof => Prof,
 1221:            server_gc_before => GC_Before,
 1222:            server_gc_after => get_server_gc_info()});
 1223: throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N) ->
 1224:     receive
 1225:         Msg ->
 1226:             case Msg of
 1227:                 {Pid, N, _} ->
 1228:                     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N - 1);
 1229:                 Other ->
 1230:                     erlang:error({self(),?FUNCTION_NAME,Other})
 1231:             end
 1232:     end.
 1233: 
 1234: get_server_gc_info() ->
 1235:     case whereis(ssl_connection_sup_dist) of
 1236:         undefined ->
 1237:             undefined;
 1238:         SupPid ->
 1239:             [{_Id,TLSDistReceiver,_Type,_Modules}|_] =
 1240:                 supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1241:             erlang:process_info(
 1242:               TLSDistReceiver, [garbage_collection,garbage_collection_info])
 1243:     end.
 1244: 
 1245: throughput_client(Pid, Mon, Payload, N) ->
 1246:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, start_time()).
 1247: 
 1248: throughput_client_loop(_Pid, Mon, _Payload, 0, StartTime) ->
 1249:     receive
 1250:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, #{} = Result} ->
 1251:             Result#{time => elapsed_time(StartTime)};
 1252:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
 1253:             exit(Other)
 1254:     end;
 1255: throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, StartTime) ->
 1256:     Pid ! {self(), N, Payload},
 1257:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N - 1, StartTime).
 1258: 
 1259: 
 1260: -define(prof, none). % none | cprof | eprof
 1261: 
 1262: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1263: prof_start() ->
 1264:     cprof:stop(),
 1265:     cprof:start(),
 1266:     ok.
 1267: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1268: prof_start() ->
 1269:     catch eprof:stop(),
 1270:     {ok,_} = eprof:start(),
 1271:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling(processes()),
 1272:     ok.
 1273: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1274: prof_start() ->
 1275:     ok.
 1276: -endif.
 1277: 
 1278: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1279: prof_stop() ->
 1280:     cprof:pause(),
 1281:     ok.
 1282: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1283: prof_stop() ->
 1284:     _ = eprof:stop_profiling(),
 1285:     ok.
 1286: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1287: prof_stop() ->
 1288:     ok.
 1289: -endif.
 1290: 
 1291: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1292: prof_end() ->
 1293:     Prof = cprof:analyse(),
 1294:     cprof:stop(),
 1295:     Prof.
 1296: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1297: prof_end() ->
 1298:     eprof:dump_data().
 1299: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1300: prof_end() ->
 1301:     [].
 1302: -endif.
 1303: 
 1304: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1305: prof_print(Prof) ->
 1306:     io:format("~p.~n", [Prof]).
 1307: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1308: prof_print(Dump) ->
 1309:     eprof:analyze(undefined, total, [], Dump).
 1310: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1311: prof_print([]) ->
 1312:     ok.
 1313: -endif.
 1314: 
 1315: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 1316: %%% Test cases helpers
 1317: 
 1318: run_nodepair_test(TestFun, Config) ->
 1319:     A = proplists:get_value({client,1}, Config),
 1320:     B = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
 1321:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
 1322:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
 1323:     HA = start_ssl_node({client,1}, Config),
 1324:     try
 1325:         HB = start_ssl_node(server, Config),
 1326:         try TestFun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB)
 1327:         after
 1328:             stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config)
 1329:         end
 1330:     after
 1331:         stop_ssl_node({client,1}, HA, Config)
 1332:     end.
 1333: 
 1334: ssl_apply(Handle, M, F, Args) ->
 1335:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, M, F, Args) of
 1336:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1337:             error(Reason);
 1338:         Result ->
 1339:             Result
 1340:     end.
 1341: 
 1342: ssl_apply(Handle, Fun) ->
 1343:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, Fun) of
 1344:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1345:             error(Reason);
 1346:         Result ->
 1347:             Result
 1348:     end.
 1349: 
 1350: start_ssl_node(Spec, Config) ->
 1351:     start_ssl_node(Spec, Config, 0).
 1352: %%
 1353: start_ssl_node({client, N}, Config, Verbose) ->
 1354:     Name = proplists:get_value({client_name, N}, Config),
 1355:     Args = get_node_args({client_dist_args, N}, Config),
 1356:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1357:     ssl_dist_test_lib:start_ssl_node(
 1358:       Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose);
 1359: start_ssl_node(server, Config, Verbose) ->
 1360:     Name = proplists:get_value(server_name, Config),
 1361:     Args = get_node_args(server_dist_args, Config),
 1362:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1363:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1364:     erpc:call(
 1365:       ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, start_ssl_node,
 1366:       [Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose]).
 1367: 
 1368: stop_ssl_node({client, _}, HA, _Config) ->
 1369:     ssl_dist_test_lib:stop_ssl_node(HA);
 1370: stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config) ->
 1371:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1372:     erpc:call(ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, stop_ssl_node, [HB]).
 1373: 
 1374: get_node_args(Tag, Config) ->
 1375:     case proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config) of
 1376:         true ->
 1377:             case proplists:get_value(ktls, Config, false) of
 1378:                 true ->
 1379:                     "-ssl_dist_opt client_ktls true server_ktls true ";
 1380:                 false ->
 1381:                     ""
 1382:             end ++ proplists:get_value(Tag, Config);
 1383:         false ->
 1384:             proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_args, Config, "")
 1385:     end.
 1386: 
 1387: 
 1388: 
 1389: payload(Size) ->
 1390:     iolist_to_binary(
 1391:       [case Size bsr 8 of
 1392:            0 ->
 1393:                [];
 1394:            Blocks ->
 1395:                payload(Blocks, create_binary(256))
 1396:        end | create_binary(Size band 255)]).
 1397: %%
 1398: payload(0, _) ->
 1399:     [];
 1400: payload(Blocks, Block) ->
 1401:     Half = payload(Blocks bsr 1, Block),
 1402:     [Half, Half |
 1403:      if
 1404:          Blocks band 1 =:= 1 ->
 1405:              Block;
 1406:          true ->
 1407:              []
 1408:      end].
 1409: 
 1410: create_binary(Size) ->
 1411:     create_binary(Size, <<>>).
 1412: %%
 1413: create_binary(0, Bin) ->
 1414:     Bin;
 1415: create_binary(Size, Bin) ->
 1416:     NextSize = Size - 1,
 1417:     create_binary(NextSize, <<Bin/binary, NextSize>>).
 1418: 
 1419: start_time() ->
 1420:     erlang:system_time().
 1421: 
 1422: elapsed_time(StartTime) ->
 1423:     erlang:system_time() - StartTime.
 1424: 
 1425: microseconds(Time) ->
 1426:     erlang:convert_time_unit(Time, native, microsecond).
 1427: 
 1428: report(Name, Value, Suffix) ->
 1429:     ?CT_PAL("~s: ~w ~s", [Name, Value, Suffix]),
 1430:     ct_event:notify(
 1431:       #event{
 1432:          name = benchmark_data,
 1433:          data = [{value, Value}, {suite, "ssl_dist"}, {name, Name}]}),
 1434:     {comment, term_to_string(Value) ++ " " ++ Suffix}.
 1435: 
 1436: term_to_string(Term) ->
 1437:     unicode:characters_to_list(
 1438:       io_lib:write(Term, [{encoding, unicode}])).
 1439: 
 1440: msacc_available() ->
 1441:     msacc:available().
 1442: 
 1443: 
 1444: mem_start(HA, HB) ->
 1445:     MemA = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1446:     MemB = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1447:     {MemA, MemB}.
 1448: 
 1449: mem_stop(HA, HB, Mem1) ->
 1450:     MemA2 = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1451:     MemB2 = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1452:     mem_result(mem_diff(Mem1, {MemA2, MemB2})).
 1453: 
 1454: mem_diff({MemA1, MemB1}, {MemA2, MemB2}) ->
 1455:     {MemA2 - MemA1, MemB2 - MemB1}.
 1456: 
 1457: mem_result({MemDiffA, MemDiffB}) ->
 1458:     MemSuffix =
 1459:         io_lib:format(
 1460:           "~.5g|~.5g MByte", [MemDiffA / (1 bsl 20), MemDiffB / (1 bsl 20)]),
 1461:     {round(MemDiffA / (1 bsl 10)), round(MemDiffB / (1 bsl 10)), MemSuffix}.
 1462: 
 1463: memory(Type) ->
 1464:     try erlang:memory(Type)
 1465:     catch error : notsup ->
 1466:             0
 1467:     end.
 1468: 
 1469: -ifdef(undefined).
 1470: 
 1471: mem() ->
 1472:     lists:foldl(
 1473:       fun ({Type, F}, Acc) ->
 1474:               F*memory(Type) + Acc
 1475:       end, 0,
 1476:       [{total, 1}, {processes, -1}, {atom, -1}, {code, -1},
 1477:        {processes_used, 1}, {atom_used, 1}]).
 1478: 
 1479: -else.
 1480: 
 1481: mem() ->
 1482:     {_Current, _MaxSince, MaxEver} =
 1483:         traverse(
 1484:           fun mem/3,
 1485:           [erlang:system_info({allocator_sizes, Alloc})
 1486:            || Alloc <- erlang:system_info(alloc_util_allocators)],
 1487:           {0, 0, 0}),
 1488:     MaxEver - memory(code). % Kind of assuming code stays allocated
 1489: 
 1490: %% allocator_sizes traversal fun
 1491: mem(
 1492:   T = {instance, _, L}, [], Acc)
 1493:   when is_list(L) ->
 1494:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1495: mem(
 1496:   T = {_, L}, [{instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1497:   when is_list(L) ->
 1498:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1499: mem(
 1500:   T = {blocks, L}, [{_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1501:   when is_list(L) ->
 1502:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1503: mem(
 1504:   T = {_, L}, [{blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1505:   when is_list(L) ->
 1506:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1507: mem(
 1508:   {size, Current, MaxSince, MaxEver},
 1509:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1510:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1511:     {0, {C + Current, S + MaxSince, E + MaxEver}};
 1512: mem(
 1513:   {size, Current},
 1514:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1515:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1516:     %% Use Current as Max since we do not have any Max values
 1517:     %% XXX future improvement when that gets added to
 1518:     %% erlang:system_info(allocator_sizes, _)
 1519:     {0, {C + Current, S + Current, E + Current}};
 1520: mem(_, _, Acc) ->
 1521:     {0, Acc}.
 1522: 
 1523: %% Traverse (Fold) over all lists in a deep term;
 1524: %% descend into the selected element of a tuple;
 1525: %% record the descent Path and supply it to Fun
 1526: %%
 1527: %% Acc cannot be an integer
 1528: traverse(Fun, Term, Acc) ->
 1529:     traverse(Fun, Term, [], Acc).
 1530: %%
 1531: traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc) ->
 1532:     if
 1533:         is_list(Term) ->
 1534:             traverse_list(Fun, Term, Path, Acc);
 1535:         is_tuple(Term) ->
 1536:             case Fun(Term, Path, Acc) of
 1537:                 {0, NewAcc} ->
 1538:                     NewAcc;
 1539:                 {N, NewAcc} when is_integer(N) ->
 1540:                     traverse(Fun, element(N, Term), [Term | Path], NewAcc)
 1541:             end;
 1542:         true ->
 1543:             Acc
 1544:     end.
 1545: 
 1546: traverse_list(Fun, [Term | Terms], Path, Acc) ->
 1547:     NewAcc = traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc),
 1548:     traverse_list(Fun, Terms, Path, NewAcc);
 1549: traverse_list(_Fun, [], _Path, Acc) ->
 1550:     Acc.
 1551: 
 1552: -endif.
